entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
